data.name: MekaFighters - Halloween Snow Patrol Nika and TERA
data.detailed_description:
Unlocks a Halloween Event skin for Nika and TERA - Halloween Snow Patrol.

Nika modified TERA to be just like a Snow Patrol Meka, but resembles something as if it doesn't belong to this galaxy.
data.about_the_game:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-530 or Similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 TI or Similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX 11 Compatible
